Help

To navigate in the list view use your mouse or alt+arrow up/down.

To convert from one format to another first use Subtitle > Open, and then Subtitle > Dowload.

Note: Only IE9 or better (latest firefox/chrome/opera) supported!

About Subtitle Edit Online

SE Online is written Html 5 - html/css/javascript
